channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: HairMax - Hair Growth Laser
channel.desc: This show features the HairMax LaserComb, a device that stimulates new hair growth by gently bathing your hair follicles with nourishing laser light.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alison Young
channel.desc: Join Alison Young on Beauty Insider to explore Ultrasun's SPF formulas. As the sun comes out, discover superior protection and a radiant complexion in this special show.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Night Time Beauty Routines
channel.desc: Upgrade your evening skincare routine with our luxurious selection of overnight face creams and treatments to ensure you wake up looking refreshed and radiant.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Routines
channel.desc: Your daily ritual just got a serious update with these beauty routines from top brands. From the best in bodycare to skincare essentials, these daily rituals will help bring out the beauty in you.
